sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useState } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import './Admin.css' import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css' import { Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Loader } from 'semantic-ui-react' import moment from 'moment' import { AnimatePresence, motion } from 'framer-motion' import SideNav, { Toggle, Nav, NavItem, NavIcon, NavText, } from '@trendmicro/react-sidenav' // Be sure to include styles at some point, probably during your bootstraping import '@trendmicro/react-sidenav/dist/react-sidenav.css' export default function Admin() { const history = useHistory() const location = useHistory() const [active, setactive] = useState(true) //loader //------------------------------------------- const [name, setname] = useState('') const [point, setpoint] = useState() const [pendingpromotion, setpendingpromotion] = useState([]) const [Txdata, setTxdata] = useState([]) const [checkTxid, setcheckTxid] = useState([]) const [keys, setkeys] = useState('') axios.defaults.withCredentials = true //------------------------------------------- const logout = () => { axios.get('/logout') history.go() //history.push("/"); } const homepage = () => { history.go() } const acceptpromotion = (a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h) => { axios .post('/acceptpromotionpoint', { req_id: a, shop_name: b, product_name: c, product_code: d, amount_point: e, picture: f, category: g, expired: h, }) .then((response) => { if (response.data.message) { alert(response.data.message) history.go() } }) } const disacceptpromotion = (id) => { axios.put(`/disacceptpromotion/${id}`).then((response) => { if (response.data.message) { alert(response.data.message) history.go() } }) } const checktransaction = () => { axios.get('/checktransaction/' + keys).then((response) => { if (response.data) { setTxdata(response.data) console.log(response.data) } else if (response.data.message) { setTxdata([ { Tx_hash: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', Tx_id: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', amount: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', id: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', recipient: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', time: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', transferor: 'ไม่พบข้อมูล', }, ]) alert(response.data.message) } }) } const checkidtransaction = (id) => { axios.get('/checkidtransaction/' + id).then((response) => { if (response) { setcheckTxid(response.data.data) console.log(checkTxid) } }) } /* ********************************** */ const pageTransition = { in: { opacity: 1, x: 0, }, out: { opacity: 0, x: '-100vh', }, } /* ********************************** */ useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setactive(false) axios.get('/login').then((response) => { if ( response.data.loggedIn === true && response.data.user[0].role === 'admin' ) { setname(response.data.user[0].name) setpoint(response.data.user[0].point) axios.get('/getpromotionrequest').then((response) => { if (response.data) { setpendingpromotion(response.data) } }) } else { history.push('/login') } }) }, 2000) return () => clearTimeout(timer) }, []) return (
{/*

Admin

Hi {name}

point : {point}

{pendingpromotion.map((show) => { return ( ) })}
request id shop name product name product code point category expired ตัวเลือก

{show.id}

{show.shop_name}

{show.product_name}

{show.product_code}

{show.amount_point}

{show.category}

{moment(show.expired).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}

*/} {/***************************************************************** */} {/*

ตรวจสอบ transaction

{ setkeys(e.target.value) }} > {Txdata.map((val) => { return ( ) })}
รหัสอ้างอิง เวลา คนโอน คนรับ จำนวน

{ checkidtransaction(val.Tx_id) }} > {val.Tx_id}

{moment(val.time).format('DD/MMMM/YYYY - LT')}

{val.transferor}

{val.recipient}

{val.amount}
*/} {/************************************************************************************** */}
T N C
Admin
  • {' '}
    Home
    ตรวจสอบข้อมูลต่างๆ
    {' '}
  • {' '}
    Logout
    ออกจากระบบ
    {' '}
Dashboard
{' '}
Point
{point}
อนุมัติโปรโมชัน
{/* ตาราง */}
{pendingpromotion.map((show) => { return ( ) })}
request_id shop_name product_name product_code point category expired ตัวเลือก

{show.id}

{show.shop_name}

{show.product_name}

{show.product_code}

{show.amount_point}

{show.category}

{moment(show.expired).format('DD/MM/YYYY')}

ตรวจสอบ Transaction
{ setkeys(e.target.value) }} >
{/* ตาราง ตรวจ transaction*/}
{Txdata.map((val) => { return ( ) })}
รหัสอ้างอิง เวลา คนโอน คนรับ จำนวน

{ checkidtransaction(val.Tx_id) }} > {val.Tx_id}

{moment(val.time).format( 'DD/MMMM/YYYY - LT', )}

{val.transferor}

{val.recipient}

{val.amount}
ตรวจสอบข้อผิดพลาด
{/* ตาราง */}
ชื่อ-สกุล เบอร์โทรศัพท์ คะแนนรวมในฐานข้อมูล คะแนนในบล็อกเชน สถานะ

) }
